type.description:
apoli:prevent_block_selection
Prevents the selection (i.e. targetting) of blocks for a player. This means they are not able to mine them, and attacks, interactions, etc. will pass through the block to whatever's behind it.
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
type.markdownDescription:
### `apoli:prevent_block_selection`
Prevents the selection (i.e. targetting) of blocks for a player. This means they are not able to mine them, and attacks, interactions, etc. will pass through the block to whatever's behind it.
## Power Type
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.

[Power Type Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/json/power/)

block_condition.description: Prevents the selection (i.e. targetting) of blocks for a player. This means they are not able to mine them, and attacks, interactions, etc. will pass through the block to whatever's behind it.
